sentences.sContent: The idea that there is life on other planets is the central premise of the novel.
sentences.sCn: 其他星球存在生命这一观点是这部小说的核心前提。

synos.tran: 引出，预先提出；作为…的前提
前提；上述各项；房屋连地基

phrases.pCn: (尤指酒店)店外，屋外，建筑物外

remMethod.val: pre(前) + mise(放) → 放在前面的东西 → 前提

trans.tranOther: a statement or idea that you accept as true and use as a base for developing other ideas
